| **[HumorReject: Decoupling LLM Safety from Refusal Prefix via A Little Humor](http://arxiv.org/abs/2501.13677v2)** | 2025-02-08 |  |
| **[Towards LLM Unlearning Resilient to Relearning Attacks: A Sharpness-Aware Minimization Perspective and Beyond](http://arxiv.org/abs/2502.05374v1)** | 2025-02-07 |  |

| **[ETA: Evaluating Then Aligning Safety of Vision Language Models at Inference Time](http://arxiv.org/abs/2410.06625v2)** | 2025-02-10 | 29pages |
| **[A Practical Examination of AI-Generated Text Detectors for Large Language Models](http://arxiv.org/abs/2412.05139v4)** | 2025-02-09 | 9 pages |
